reviewText:
Cancion En Al Alma

Duration 70:25
A family film that touches the heart. "A Song From the Heart" is
about a young orphan who is left by his selfish aunt and uncle
to be raised by his grandfather. His loving grandfather, a composer,
encourages him to become a singer. In a short time, Pepito
becomes the singing sensation of Colombia. Due to his success,
Pepito's greedy relatives come to Bogota to claim him in a bitter
custody battle which ends with Pepito sharing his gift with the world.

UPC 090328302184
Made in the USA
